summary: Criminals hijack a plane and force the pilot and his daughter to fly them to Mexico. However, an unexpected landing finds them in a cemetery inhabited by killer scarecrows.
cast: Ted Vernon|Michael David Simms|Richard Vidan|Kristina Sanborn|Victoria Christian|David Campbell|B.J. Turner|Dax Vernon|Tony Santory|Phil Zenderland|Mike Balog|Don Herbert|Howard E. Haller|Dyanne DiRosario
title: Zona restringida
